name: Rachel Green
interest: Scrum Master & Agile Coach helping teams write clear acceptance criteria and user stories

jobs.description: Facilitating 3 scrum teams (25 engineers) delivering features for 200K+ users

projects.title: Agile Transformation
projects.description: Led agile adoption improving team velocity by 55% and reducing cycle time by 40%

insights.description: Reduced story ambiguity through structured acceptance criteria workshops
Decreased sprint rollover from 30% to 5% through better story definition
Improved team satisfaction scores from 6.8 to 9.2

User story template: As a [role], I want [capability] so that [benefit]. Acceptance Criteria: Given [context], When [action], Then [outcome]. Definition of Done: Code complete, tests pass, docs updated, deployed to staging
